con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-ThirdPartiesErrors
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests charging customer with errors from third party software like Piranha, OCS-10, PPIT 1. Bad-Case with Pranha error - register with soapFault from Pirnaha
2. Bad-Case with OCS-10 errors - register new msisdns - charging with ocs-error permanent - charging with ocs-error transien -deregister
3. Bad-Case with PPIT.NotifyAboutBankTransaction errors - register new msisdn - charge customer - Start Pain008 Jobs - Check notifyAboutTransactions

con:request.name: 10620N_OCS-walletThresholdEventExtNot-OCS10-Error=1-Permanent
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:v1="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_types/v1"> <soapenv:Header> <add:MessageID>http://www.your.gov/certo/dare</add:MessageID> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <v1:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest> <v1:userCode>${#TestSuite#DRC-OCS-extNotify-userCode}</v1:userCode> <v1:result> <!--type: string--> <v1:opReference>${#Project#GUID}</v1:opReference> <v1:subscriberRelatedInfo> <v1:subscriberId>
<v1:e164Number>${#TestCase#msisdn-OCS10-Permanent}</v1:e164Number></v1:subscriberId> <!--type: string--> <v1:tariffPlan>3P</v1:tariffPlan> <v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: string--> <v1:subscriberState>A</v1:subscriberState> <v1:subscriberSubState>A</v1:subscriberSubState> </v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: string--> <v1:technologyCode>0100</v1:technologyCode> <v1:serviceProviderId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-OCS-ID}</v1:serviceProviderId> </v1:subscriberRelatedInfo> <v1:monetaryInfo> <!--type: CurrencyCodeType--> <v1:currencyCode>${#Project#Currency_Default}</v1:currencyCode> <v1:opCost exponent="-2">100</v1:opCost> <v1:balance exponent="-2">500</v1:balance> </v1:monetaryInfo> <v1:operationInfo> <!--type: string--> <v1:operationCode>Test</v1:operationCode> <!--type: int--> <v1:subOperationCode>9999</v1:subOperationCode> </v1:operationInfo> <!--type: boolean--> <v1:flagOperationOrCancellation>false</v1:flagOperationOrCancellation> </v1:result> <v1:walletThresholdEvent> <v1:walletThreshold> <!--type: string--> <v1:walletId>2</v1:walletId> <v1:threshold exponent="-2">${#TestSuite#Threshold.thresholdAmount-Min}</v1:threshold> </v1:walletThreshold> </v1:walletThresholdEvent> </v1:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 10650N_chargeCustomer-PPIT-Error=17-Permanent
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#contractID-PPIT-Permanent}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestSuite#rechargeAmount-Default}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>ON_DEMAND</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:--> </cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
